summary.span: 命名空间包含一组可以在 Office 解决方案中的 宿主项上使用的 Windows 窗体控件。

span.span: The namespace contains a set of Windows Forms controls that can be used on a host item in an Office solution.

summary.span: 其中每个类可使用特定于 Microsoft Office Word 文档的附加功能来扩展 命名空间中的基类。

span.span: Each of these classes extends a base class that is in the namespace with additional functionality specific to a Microsoft Office Word document.

summary.span: 例如， 类扩展 类的功能。

span.span: For example, the class extends the functionality of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以添加和删除控件在此命名空间中运行时通过使用适当的方法。You can add and remove the controls in this namespace at run time by using the appropriate method. 例如，使用方法将添加在运行时向文档。For example, use the method to add a to a document at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time). 在 word 文档级项目中，您可以还添加此命名空间中的控件到 Word 文档在设计时通过从工具箱拖动控件时，直接到你的文档。In a document-level project for Word, you can also add the controls in this namespace to your Word document at design time by dragging a control from the Toolbox directly to your document. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：为 Office 文档添加 Windows 窗体控件](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-windows-forms-controls-to-office-documents)。For more information, see [How to: Add Windows Forms Controls to Office Documents](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-windows-forms-controls-to-office-documents). 没有添加到 Word 文档的 Windows 窗体控件和 Windows 窗体控件添加到 Windows 窗体之间的一些差异。There are some differences between Windows Forms controls that are added to Word documents and Windows Forms controls that are added to Windows Forms. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Limitations of Windows Forms Controls on Office Documents](/visualstudio/vsto/limitations-of-windows-forms-controls-on-office-documents)。For more information, see [Limitations of Windows Forms Controls on Office Documents](/visualstudio/vsto/limitations-of-windows-forms-controls-on-office-documents).
